## PHPServer.request() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
request(request: PHPServerRequest): Promise<PHPResponse>;
```

-   `request` – The request.
-   Returns: The response.

Serves the request – either by serving a static file, or by
dispatching it to the PHP runtime.
